title: Steel Panther Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Blind Guardian Tickets for their 2015 “The Well Hungover Tour” Dates for Cities like Calgary, Nashville, and Houston
text:
Steel Panther concert tickets for their 2015 tour dates are on sale now for cities like Calgary, Nashville, and Houston Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Steel Panther fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a vast selection of Steel Panther concert tickets at affordable prices. Steel Panther are hitting the road in 2015 and kicking it all off on November 12th in Halifax, Nova Scotia.
Steel Panther is a rock metal band hailing from Los Angeles, CA. Steel Panther broke out onto the scene in 2009 with their debut album, Feel the Steel. The band is known for its humorous and profane lyrics onstage.
